TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Tuple extends System.Object
public ref class Tuple abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用於建立 Tuple 物件的靜態方法。

span.span: Provides static methods for creating tuple objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定數目的項目序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of elements. Tuple 的範例是具有三個項目 （又稱為 3 tuple 或三重物件） 用來儲存識別碼，例如，某個人的名稱在第一個項目，在第二個元素，且該人員的 income 該年份的第三個項目中之年的資料結構。An example of a tuple is a data structure with three elements (known as a 3-tuple or triple) that is used to store an identifier such as a person's name in the first element, a year in the second element, and the person's income for that year in the third element. .NET Framework 會直接支援一到七個元素的 tuple。The .NET Framework directly supports tuples with one to seven elements. 此外，您可以建立八個或多個元素 tuple，藉由巢狀中的 tuple 物件屬性物件。In addition, you can create tuples of eight or more elements by nesting tuple objects in the property of a object. 中四種方法通常會使用 Tuple:Tuples are commonly used in four ways: - 代表單一的資料集。To represent a single set of data. 比方說，tuple 可以代表資料庫記錄，而其元件可以表示個別欄位的記錄。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供讓您輕鬆存取、 和操作的資料集。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. - 若要從方法傳回多個值，而不使用`out`參數 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`參數 （在 Visual Basic)。To return multiple values from a method without using `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). - 若要將多個值傳遞至方法，以透過單一參數。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法具有單一參數，可讓您提供一個執行緒在啟動時執行之方法的值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup time. 如果您提供物件做為方法引數中，您可以提供資料的三個項目在執行緒啟動常式。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with three items of data. 類別不能本身代表 tuple。The class does not itself represent a tuple. 相反地，它會提供用於建立 tuple 類型支援.NET Framework 的執行個體的靜態方法的類別。Instead, it is a class that provides static methods for creating instances of the tuple types that are supported by the .NET Framework. 它提供 helper 方法，您可以呼叫 tuple 物件的具現化，而不需要明確指定 tuple 中的每個元件的類型。It provides helper methods that you can call to instantiate tuple objects without having to explicitly specify the type of each tuple component. 雖然您可以藉由呼叫其類別建構函式建立 tuple 類別的執行個體，若要這樣做的程式碼可能會相當繁雜。Although you can create an instance of a tuple class by calling its class constructor, the code to do so can be cumbersome. 下列範例會使用類別建構函式建立 7 tuple 或 7-tuple，包含每個人口普查 1950 到 2000 New York City 的母體擴展資料。The following example uses a class constructor to create a 7-tuple or septuple that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1950 through 2000. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 使用 helper 方法來建立相同的 tuple 物件很更簡單，如下列範例所示。Creating the same tuple object by using a helper method is more straightforward, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/cs/example1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.class/vb/example1.vb#2)] Helper 方法會直接支援有一到八個元件 (也就是透過 octuples singleton) 的 tuple 物件的建立。The helper methods directly support the creation of tuple objects that have from one to eight components (that is, singletons through octuples). 雖然沒有元件數目沒有實際限制可能會有一個 tuple，helper 方法並不適用於建立 tuple 的九個或多個元件。Although there is no practical limit to the number of components a tuple may have, helper methods are not available to create a tuple with nine or more components. 若要建立這類 tuple，您必須呼叫建構函式。To create such a tuple, you must call the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 如需詳細資訊和範例，使用 tuple，請參閱.NET Framework 中的個別 tuple 類型的文件。For additional information and examples that use tuples, see the documentation for the individual tuple types in the .NET Framework. 這些必要條件列於本主題結尾的 < 另請參閱區段。These are listed in the See Also section at the end of this topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 8 個 tuple (octuple)，其中包含會小於 20 的質數。The following example creates an 8-tuple (octuple) that contains prime numbers that are less than 20. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)]

span.span: Creates a new 7-tuple, or septuple.
A 7-tuple whose value is (, , , , , , ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 helper 方法，您可以呼叫來執行個體化 7 tuple 物件，而不需要明確指定其元件的類型。 is a helper method that you can call to instantiate a 7-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下列範例會使用7 tuple 具現化的方法。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 7-tuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#13)] 此程式碼相當於下列呼叫類別建構函式。This code is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#14)]

summary.span: 建立新的 8-tuple 或八重 (Octuple) 物件。

span.span: Creates a new 8-tuple, or octuple.

returns.span: 值為 (、、、、、、、) 的 8-Tuple 或八重 (Octuple)。

span.span: An 8-tuple (octuple) whose value is (, , , , , , , ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 helper 方法，您可以呼叫來執行個體化 8 tuple，而不需要明確指定其元件的類型。 is a helper method that you can call to instantiate an 8-tuple without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫建構函式來建立具有九個或多個元件的 tuple，除非您的語言提供此用途的特殊語法。You must call the constructor to create a tuple with nine or more components unless your language provides a special syntax for this purpose. 靜態 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 的方法類別不能用來建立九個或多個元件的 tuple。The static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods of the class cannot be used to create a tuple with nine or more components. ## Examples 下列範例會建立其元件是質數小於 20 的 8 個 tuple。The following example creates an 8-tuple whose components are prime numbers that are less than 20. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/createntuple.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/createntuple.vb#17)] 這相當於下列的範例中，使用類別建構函式，而不是factory 建立方法。This is equivalent to the following example, which uses the class constructor instead of the factory creation method. 請注意 該具現化以這種方式的物件包含了相當多的程式碼，因為您必須宣告巢狀物件當做產生 octuple 物件的第八個元件。Note that instantiating a object in this way involves considerably more code, because you must declare a nested object as the object's eighth component to produce an octuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/ctor8.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/ctor8.vb#20)]
